name: Virginia Petite Room | 1 Queen
description: 225-square foot rooms located in the Virginia Tower on floors 3-10, featuring one queen-size bed. The petite queen rooms include a High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee. Non-smoking and smoking options available.
shortDescription: Compact 225 sq ft queen room in the Virginia Tower with all essential amenities.

meta.title: Virginia Petite Room 1 Queen – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Virginia Petite Room at Eldorado Resort Reno – cozy 225 sq ft queen room in the Virginia Tower with Wi-Fi and refreshment center.

testimonials.quote: Virginia Petite Room | 1 Queen was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Travis M.

testimonials.quote: Visited Virginia Petite Room | 1 Queen during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Lisa K.
testimonials.meta: Yelp · date night during golf trip
